definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: But Mr. Viniar declined to discuss in detail the impact that the new regulations would have on Goldman, saying that it was too early to give any guidance on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 关于新法案对高盛的影响，维尼亚拒绝详细置评。

sentences.english: A spokeswoman for the FTC declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: FTC的一名发言人拒绝置评。

sentences.english: Borsig, through a spokesman, declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 博尔西希通过一位发言人拒绝置评。

sentences.english: A spokeswoman for Mr. Rajaratnam's legal team declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 拉贾拉特南律师团的一位发言人拒绝置评。

sentences.english: Members of the Ampatuan family couldn't be reached to comment.
sentences.chinese: 记者暂时无法联系到安帕图安家族成员进行置评。

sentences.english: Spokeswomen for Apple and Microsoft declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 苹果公司和微软公司的发言人拒绝置评。

sentences.english: A spokeswoman for Brookfield declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁克菲尔德公司的发言人拒绝置评。

sentences.english: Markets see-sawed all day, with S&P officials refusing to comment on their plans.
sentences.chinese: 市场全天反复涨跌，标普高管拒绝就其计划置评。

sentences.english: Li's parents declined to comment on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 周二，李翔的父母拒绝置评。

sentences.english: Chinese weapons manufacturers have declined to comment on the issue.
sentences.chinese: 中国军火商曾拒绝就此事置评。

sentences.english: Zhuzhou Electric Locomotive could not be reached for comment Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 记者周四无法联系株洲电力机车公司就此置评。

sentences.english: Lawrence and Cissell could not be reached for comment.
sentences.chinese: 记者无法联系劳伦斯和西塞尔就此置评。

sentences.english: Meanwhile we shall not and could not comment on anything regarding our customers.
sentences.chinese: 同时对于任何有关客户的事物，我们不能也不予置评。

sentences.english: Toyota declined to make Mr. Okuda available for comment.
sentences.chinese: 丰田拒绝安排奥田硕发表置评。
防务研究与开发局拒绝置评。

definition: to declare to be untrue/to deny
to quote/to cite/to recommend (one's friend's, associates etc)
to declare one's position/to say where one stands
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
